member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the Window.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.ContentTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template that is used to display the content of the Window.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Window is open or not.
member.value: true if the Window is open; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.IsFullScreen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Window is shown in full screen or not.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.IsModal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Window is shown modal or not.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.ModalBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the modal brush.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.ModalBrushOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the modal brush opacity.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.HorizontalPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal position.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.VerticalPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical position.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.HorizontalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal offset.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.VerticalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical offset.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.IsClosedOnBackButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Window will be closed or not, when the back button is pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.IsAppBarHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the app bar will be hidden or not, when the Window is open.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.IsClosedOnOutsideTap
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Window will be closed or not, when the user taps outside of it.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.UseOpenAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the animation will be shown or not, when the Window is open.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.UseCloseAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the animation will be shown or not, when the Window is closed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.ShowAgain
member.summary: Gets or sets the ShowAgain property value. When true, the window will be displayed the next time it is requested.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.ForceShowAgain
member.summary: Gets or set the ForceShowAgain property value. When true, the window will be displayed the next time it is requested regardless the ShowAgain property value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.UniqueKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the UniqueKey property value, used to identify a specific ShowAgain user response.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.Storage
member.summary: Gets or sets a class implementing the IXamWindowStorage interface. DefaultXamWindowStorage class is set by default.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.CloseOnBackButton
member.summary: Occurs when the back button is pressed and the Window is closed.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamWindow.Closed
member.summary: Occurs when the Window is closed.
